title: Virtual Architect
overview: This was my final year undergraduate project. I used 3D Studio Max to create the models and later imported them into the OpenGL space. Users could draw/move objects in the Java based 2D drawing area and fly/pan/rotate around in the 3D navigation area using arrow keys.
